ing: 1/2 cup cream cheese, at room temperature
3 tablespoons apple cider, or more as needed
des: "I came up with this recipe when the orange juice in another recipe didn't fit the flavor profile I was looking for."
ins: Combine cream cheese and confectioners' sugar in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy. Beat in apple cider, 1 tablespoon at a time, until desired consistency is reached.
